name: BEST WESTERN Louvre Piemont

reviews.title: wrongly draw money from my credit card....!!!!!!!!!
reviews.text: i booked Best Western Louvre Piemont hotel by HRS on 18.12.2008 at 16.13.When i book my reservation from Hotel Reservation Service,i can cancel my reservation 28/12/2008 till 18.00 free of charge.But hotel charge my credit card 199 eu on 19/12/2008.Now the date is 11/03/2008 and Best Western Louvre Piemont dot sent my money back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First thing how the people trust Best Western Louvre Piemont and give credit card detail to them.Secondly i also give an information to Hotel Reservation system and they don't help me till today.11/03/2008.i cancel my reservation 27/12/2007 and i cancelled my trip after that happend......Please think before give your credit card to Best Western Louvre Piemont!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Disappointing, at least

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Don't recommend this hotel...however location was great

aka: Best Western Louvre Piemont Hotel Paris
